workshoptitle: Getting Started with Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Introduction to Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Install and Configure Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to set up the GitHub Development Environment, and install GitHub Desktop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Multiple Domains
tutorials.description: This lab describes how to create multiple domains in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Set Up the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Server on the Oracle WebLogic Platform for High Availability
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to  you how to set up the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Server (version: 12.2.1.2) deployed on the Oracle Weblogic Platform for High Availability.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Connect the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Agent to Autonomous Data Warehouse
tutorials.description: This lab describes how to connect the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata to Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and Autonomous Transaction Processing (ATP) by using the Oracle Wallet.

tutorials.title: Lab 5:  Use the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Command-line Utilities
tutorials.description: This lab describes how to accomplish the tasks using Oracle GoldenGate Veridata command-line utilities: Create Oracle GoldenGate Veridata configuration using the Veridata GoldenGate Parameter Processing program from the Oracle GoldenGate parameter files, and Run the compare job using Vericom.
